question: PGL Astana: Aurora vs. FURIA
description:
Aurora and FURIA are scheduled to play each other in the 3rd place decider match of the 2025 PGL Astana Tournament on May 18, 2025, at 4:00 AM ET.

This market will resolve to “Aurora” if Aurora win against FURIA in the 3rd place match of the 2025 PGL Astana Tournament.

This market will resolve to “FURIA” if FURIA win against Aurora in the 3rd place match of the 2025 PGL Astana Tournament.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond May 28, 2025, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the PGL (https://www.pglesports.com/cs2/pgl-astana-2025/).

question: Will the price of Bitcoin be less than $103K on May 19 at 5 PM ET?
description:
This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for BTCUSDT 19 May '25 17:00 in the ET timezone. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTCUSDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTCUSDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: IEM Dallas: Vitality vs. Legacy
description:
Vitality vs. Legacy are scheduled to play each other in the group stage of the 2025 IEM Dallas Tournament on May 19, 2025, at 3:00 PM ET.

This market will resolve to “Vitality” if Vitality win against Legacy in the group stage of the 2025 IEM Dallas Tournament.

This market will resolve to “Legacy” if Legacy win against Vitality in the group stage of the 2025 IEM Dallas Tournament.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond June 28, 2025, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the HLTV (https://www.hltv.org/events/8037/iem-dallas-2025).
